attributes.action: Lowering the General Election Voting Age to 16
attributes.additional_details: The youth of Scotland have voted in the referendum from 16 upwards.  Now they are to be disenfranchised for the 2015 Westminster elections.  This is a mockery of the franchise.  All the youth of the UK should be enfranchised from 16 upwards to re-awaken the political system.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Lower the UK franchise to 16 year's of age

Created by: Rudi Affolter

Closing: 30/03/2015
